import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Tab,Nav, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Contacts from './Contacts' import Conversations from './Conversations' const CONTACTS_KEY = 'contacts' const CONVERSATIONS_KEY = 'conversations' export default function Sidebar({id}) { const [activeKey, setActiveKey] = useState(CONVERSATIONS_KEY) const conversationsOpen = activeKey === CONVERSATIONS_KEY return (
Conversations Contacts
Your Id : {id}
) }
